name: Mixtape
storyline: You play as a Jackalope named Fenrir, who is given a mixtape in a letter from his frienemy Faffy. This mixtape allows him to explore another world whenever he listens to it.
summary: Mixtape is an English Yume Nikki fangame created by GumshoeJump. The game was made for Dream Diary Jam 2 in RPG Maker 2003.
